title: Bus-Tram-Cable Car Simulator: San Francisco [1.05]
description:
Bus-Tram-Cable Car Simulator: San Francisco [1.05]
description:
Metropolitan area in California on the west coast of the United States. Get behind the wheel of any public transportra: bus, bus-bunching, trolleybuses, trams and other vehicles. At your disposal 16 detailed specification of unique vehicles. Manage them in a huge, free game world, among the hundreds of streets with the ups and downs, following the schedule. Keep track of your vehicle and make money.

1. run setup.exe
2. Wait for the installation
